Description.Text:
The Hotel HF Tuela Ala Sul is a 3-star hotel offering 43 rooms all equipped with air conditioning, desk, telephone, cable TV, free Wi-Fi Internet service, Flat-screen TV, bathroom with toiletries free, bath or shower. In the hotel you can also find a nice restaurant where you can enjoy a full breakfast and a bar. In the neighborhood you will also have the opportunity to experience traditional cuisine in one of the many restaurants that surround the hotel. Also worth noting the 24 hour reception service, room service, laundry service, rent-a-car service, meeting rooms, shuttle service and the Wi-Fi internet service available throughout the hotel.
The Hotel HF Tuela Ala Sul is located about 10 minutes walking from the Douro River banks and about 12 minutes walking from Crystal Palace Gardens. Porto Airport is located just 15 minutes driving from the hotel.
